title: [Group] 3br1ba apt w/ Free Laundry - $1050
posting_body: Conveniently located between Inman Square (Whole Foods, great restaurants, coffee shops, etc.) and Union Square (MORE great restaurants, Market Basket, a summer farmer's market, and so much fun stuff to do when there isn't a pandemic)

-easy access to the 91, 86, 83 and CT2 buses (also a 15-20 min walk to Central Square/Red Line T, Longwood shuttle buses, CT1, 1, 47, 70 and 70A buses, and 15-minute walk from Harvard Square, as well)
-On-street parking with MA plates/Somerville resident permit ($40/year) and it’s very easy to find parking (we also have 2-day visitor permits)
-Dishwasher and garbage disposal installed in kitchen
-Rooms have many windows and lots of light!
High ceilings and wood floors, too!
-Backyard with porch facing garden and park
